body.name: Club Car Pre-2000 "STAPLE ON" Golf Cart Seat Cover (2 Stripe)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Up To Par Covers Store

features: MADE IN U.S.A - All our products are proudly made in U.S.A and are made with high quality marine grade vinyl and top stitched for extra strength and to help prevent water from getting through. All our products are made to order. We politely ask for up to 5 business days to produce and ship.
Free samples of our colors are available by request. Just let us know what colors you would like to see. The colors on your screen may differ from what you actually receive.

This seat cover is designed specifically for the model cart listed in the title and in the pictures of this listing. They are designed to fit the original unaltered seating. If your cart does not match the title or pictures, it will not fit your seating. If you do not see your cart here, we have plenty of other options in our store. Click on our logo to see more options. You may also contact us and send pictures of your cart to help verify what you may need.

DIY - Easy to Install - This is a full replacement seat cover. They are designed to be stapled on. There will be enough material to wrap under the seat and staple. Mostly all pictures you see of our products are all customer done and a lot of our customers have zero to very little experience in upholstery work.
When your cart is complete. Please help us by reviewing the product. Send us pictures of your work. We love to see our products on your cart.
body.description: What's Included - Vinyl staple-on seat cover for seat and backrest.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #16,410 in Handmade Products (See Top 100 in Handmade Products) #9 in Handmade Golf Cart Seats & Covers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Update to Give Your Cart a New Look
reviews.reviewText: This material is high quality, and it fit my 1992 Club Car Seats perfectly. Very easy to install on my old seats, and it made the seats look brand new. The colors are vibrant as well. I would recommend this to anyone. I've never tackled a project like this before, and if I can do it and it turns out great, anyone can do it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These things are sweet.
reviews.reviewText: These covera came about a week early. Getting ready to renovate the old club car. Of course you need to get rid of the old seat covers. I am not an upholstery person and they turned out awesome. Covering these seats was super easy. I warmed them up in the house so the would stretch and away I went. Some staples and a razor knife to trim the excess off and done. Cant wait to get the paint done and see them mounted. Thanks for a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and finish!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install even if you need to replace the seat plywood. For the backrests I just went over the existing material. You'd never know it and adds a bit of cushion. Great price, quality and service from Tim was really helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: real leather feel, love the quality! as soon as i get my red and white on yamaha i can give you a look but love them! The stitching was great in the quality of the material on the inside they wrote front to back on the seat which was nice on the back seats I had to kind of figure it out it's an old golf cart so I had to add stuffing where I needed it love the price of this company and love the color thank you so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These covers fit great and are made from sturdy comfortable material. An air powered stapler makes installation easier. I ordered covers on the 3rd and they shipped priority mail two days later. Didn’t receive them til the 20th but that’s how the USPS is anymore. So sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, wrong color!
reviews.reviewText: First I’d like to mention that we ordered “TAUPE” hoping it would be more green like the picture, but it is definitely a tan/gray color. Not mad about it, but I suggest getting a swatch prior to ordering!!!!Second, WE ARE OBSESSED. These look so good on our old pre-2000s DS cart that we are remodeling.Third, It was recommended to us that we get a heat gun to help stretch the material and that definitely helped! We 100% recommend getting a $20 heat gun from like harbor freight to help loosen the leather and make sure you can get a nice tight seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are a beautiful inexpensive replacement for your old weather stained and cracked seat covers. I have never done upholstery before and was fairly easy to get it installed right. You'll need a good staple gun and a sharp knife.
